displaytitle: Statuette of Aphrodite (Louvre-Naples type), after a Greek original of ca. 420-410 B.C.
dimensions: preserved: 53.1 x 19.8 x base 9.2 cm (20 7/8 x 7 13/16 x 3 5/8 in.)
creditline: Gift of Edward Sampson, Class of 1914, for the Alden Sampson Collection

titles.title: Statuette of Aphrodite (Louvre-Naples type), after a Greek original of ca. 420-410 B.C.

texts.textentryhtml: Given to the Museum by Edward Sampson
texts.remarks: Batch edit for Provenance publiation project 10/2023; created in project follow-up - FLB

caption: Roman, probably late 2nd century CE, Statuette of Aphrodite (Louvre-Naples type), after a Greek original of ca. 420-410 B.C. Medium-grained white marble; 53.1 x 19.8 x 9.2 cm. Gift of Edward Sampson, Class of 1914, for the Alden Sampson Collection (y1962-135)
